data.message: Can we make our own year in review? I know in the past we could?

replies.message: Yes, Joye. You'll be able to create your own Year in Review that highlights your top moments on Facebook. Your personalized Year in Review will be available very soon! -Natalie
Mine was available...but no way to share it??? Will this be fixed as well?

Mine was available as well but could not share it.  Facebook just kept responding, "Try again in a few minutes".  It did this for over twelve hours.  The drag is that after customizing it, the sharing feature is the part that saves it.  After getting the "Try again" warning, it wipes everything and you must start from scratch all over again.  Each time I spent customizing it, it was almost an hour.  Hit the share button and it would not work.  :-(
